body_html:
Hi, is this issue resolved?

I want to include tensorflow in my c++ app and including file #include "tensorflow/core/public/session.h" causes the error
tensorflow/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:1:42: fatal error: unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor: No such file or directory

I've built tensorflow with bazel build -c opt //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so and I added tensorflow repo directory, as well as bazel-genfiles to include path
body_text:
Hi, is this issue resolved?
I want to include tensorflow in my c++ app and including file #include "tensorflow/core/public/session.h" causes the error
tensorflow/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:1:42: fatal error: unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor: No such file or directory
I've built tensorflow with bazel build -c opt //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so and I added tensorflow repo directory, as well as bazel-genfiles to include path
body:
Hi, is this issue resolved?

I want to include tensorflow in my c++ app and including file `#include "tensorflow/core/public/session.h"` causes the error
`tensorflow/third_party/eigen3/unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor:1:42: fatal error: unsupported/Eigen/CXX11/Tensor: No such file or directory`

I've built tensorflow with `bazel build -c opt //tensorflow:libtensorflow_cc.so` and I added tensorflow repo directory, as well as `bazel-genfiles` to include path
